resources.string: You have permanently denied access to storage
Whatsapp Cleaner needs to access the device storage in order to works properly. Next time you be asked for, you should consider grant storage permission, otherwise cleanups will not take place
Cleanup failed due to media unmounted
Cleanup may had failed to delete some backups
You need to grant write storage permission in order to cleanup the backups

plurals.name: files_deleted_info
plurals.item: Deleted %1$d backup database file releasing %2$d MB from internal storage
Deleted %1$d backup database files releasing %2$d MB from internal storage
